Source: https://gh.2markers.com/427574. Coordinates extracted from multiple sources confirm the location of Olne, Belgium. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mindat.org/loc-145983.html. web_search_companies.notes: Holcim Granulats (Belgique) SA is the operator of the Trooz quarry in Olne.
